wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Pepper (born 2 March 1989) is an English Paralympian swimmer. Pepper competes in the S14 disability category in freestyle and breaststroke. He represented Great Britain at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London, and in 2010 he won two gold medals at the World Championships in Eindhoven.

response: *Daniel Pepper, Paralympic swimmer, Double IPC World Champion
